Description: Alzheimer’s disease including dementia in Alzheimer’s
Dementia including dementia in Alzheimer’s disease (14)
Depressive disorders including depression and Bipolar
Hemiplegia except with acute phase of stroke and unless this becomes a chronic condition in its own right
Psychosis and psychotic disorders including schizotypal and delusional disorders
Chronic kidney disease including chronic tubule-interstitial nephritis small kidney (s) and polycystic kidneys (s)
Urinary retention with no known cause or treated symptoms
Abnormal liver function tests with no known causes
Dehydration described as severe or treated with IV fluids
Hypovolemia treated with IV fluids or blood transfusion
Tendency to fall due to old age or other unclear health problems (Geriatric or elderly falls)
